## BoundingBox.behindPlane() method

Check if this bounding volume is behind a plane

**Signature:**

```typescript
behindPlane(plane: Plane): boolean;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  plane | [Plane](doc/markdown/./base.plane.md) | The plane to check |

**Returns:**

boolean

true if the bounding volume behinds the plane, false otherwise
